clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of a Nursing Program for Patients With Cystic Fibrosis on Disease Management
clinical_study.official_title: Auswirkung Eines CF Nursing-Programms Auf Das Krankheitsmanagement Und Die Erfahrungen Der Behandlung Von Patientinnen Und Patienten

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of a nursing program in patients with cystic fibrosis.

detailed_description.textblock: All patients living with cystic fibrosis will be asked by questionnaire before (November 2014) and after (September 2016) the implementation of the program about their satisfaction with treatment, trust in the CF-Team, adherence, self-efficacy, treatment burden and quality of life.

primary_outcome.measure: Difference between baseline patient satisfaction and month 22
primary_outcome.description: Self-reported patient satisfaction will be measured with a newly developped questionnaire.

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference between baseline adherence and month 22
secondary_outcome.description: Self-reported adherence to therapy will be measured with the Medication Adherence Report Scale (MARS) and a newly developped questionnaire.

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference between baseline self-efficacy and month 22
secondary_outcome.description: Self-reported self-efficacy to master the the therapeutic regimen will be measured with a newly developped questionnaire.

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference between baseline treatment burden and month 22
secondary_outcome.description: Self-reported treatment burden will be measured wiht a subscale of the CFQ-R.

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference between baseline trust and month 22
secondary_outcome.description: Self-reported trust will be measured with the short version of the Wake Forest Trust Scale.

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference between baseline information need and month 22
secondary_outcome.description: Information needs will be assessed with a subscale of the PICKER-questionnaire for patients with CF.

other_outcome.measure: Difference between baseline QoL and month 22
other_outcome.description: Self-reported QoL will be measured with the Cystic Fibrosis Questionnaire - revised (CFQ-R) and the VAS of the European Quality of Life Instrument - 5 dimensions (EQ-5D VAS).
